column5: Casa Agave has a large bedroom with a king bed. It boasts high ceilings, exposed beams, has a bonus outdoor shower, amazing unobstructed views of the Chisos Mountains, a small refrigerator and a tea and coffee station. Casa Agave has a porch, private parking, outdoor fire pit, privacy and is just minutes from everything in the Terlingua Ghost town. It shares an entry gate through the courtyard with The Octotillo Suite.
